document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi suffered a shattering loss in his northern stronghold of milan on monday in local elections that threaten to unbalance his fractious center-right coalition government.
document.title: berlusconi suffers heavy local poll defeats
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi suffered a shattering loss in his northern stronghold of milan on monday in local elections that threaten to unbalance his fractious center-right coalition government.
